languages.text: "Это не ловушка, а выстрел себе в ногу — только идиот надеется за раз одолеть Вольного Торговца и {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}проктора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Это не ловушка, а выстрел себе в ногу — только идиот надеется за раз одолеть Вольного Торговца и {g|Encyclopedia:ProctorGlossary}проктора{/g}".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."
languages.original_text: "Это не ловушка, а выстрел себе в ногу — только идиот надеется за раз одолеть Вольного Торговца и проктора".

traits.locale_text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."
"You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."
"You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."
"You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."
"You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."

languages.text: “根本没有任何人落入你的陷阱里，你不过是在自寻死路罢了。只有白痴才会以为自己足以对抗行商浪人和监察官结成的联盟。”
languages.original_text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."

traits.locale_text: “根本没有任何人落入你的陷阱里，你不过是在自寻死路罢了。只有白痴才会以为自己足以对抗行商浪人和监察官结成的联盟。”

languages.text: «No ha atrapado a nadie; más bien se ha cavado su propia tumba. Solo un idiota se creería capaz de vencer a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente y a un Procurador del Arbites».
languages.original_text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."

traits.locale_text: «No ha atrapado a nadie; más bien se ha cavado su propia tumba. Solo un idiota se creería capaz de vencer a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente y a un Procurador del Arbites».

languages.text: "Kimseyi tuzağa düşürmedin, kendi ayağına sıktın. Sadece bir aptal, bir Hür Tacir'le Üsteğmen'i birlikte alt edebileceğini düşünür."
languages.original_text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."

traits.locale_text: "Kimseyi tuzağa düşürmedin, kendi ayağına sıktın. Sadece bir aptal, bir Hür Tacir'le Üsteğmen'i birlikte alt edebileceğini düşünür."

languages.text: 「誰も罠にかけてはいない。自分自身を足元に撃っただけだ。ローグトレーダーと代理人を一緒に相手して勝てると考えるなんて馬鹿なやつだけだ」
languages.original_text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."

traits.locale_text: 「誰も罠にかけてはいない。自分自身を足元に撃っただけだ。ローグトレーダーと代理人を一緒に相手して勝てると考えるなんて馬鹿なやつだけだ」

languages.text: « Vous n'avez piégé personne, vous n'avez fait que vous tirer une balle dans le pied. Il faut vraiment être bête pour croire pouvoir doubler {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et un proctor. »
languages.original_text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez piégé personne, vous n'avez fait que vous tirer une balle dans le pied. Il faut vraiment être bête pour croire pouvoir doubler {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} et un proctor. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt niemanden in die Falle gelockt, Ihr habt Euch selbst in den Fuß geschossen. Nur ein Idiot würde glauben, dass er {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} UND einen Proktor bezwingen kann."
languages.original_text: "You didn't trap anyone — you shot yourself in the foot. Only an idiot would think they could outmatch a Rogue Trader and a Proctor together."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt niemanden in die Falle gelockt, Ihr habt Euch selbst in den Fuß geschossen. Nur ein Idiot würde glauben, dass er {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} UND einen Proktor bezwingen kann."
